songs.title: No Me Pidas Amor (Don’t Ask Me Love)
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Don't ask me love
Cause you know how much I love you
And everyday I make it realized
If you don’t feel the love I always give you
I think I'm gonna change my mind

[Bridge]
I oh oh oh I
I always traying to make you feel glad
You feel glad

[Verse]
You oh oh oh you
You make me sad
And you know it´s upright
Is upright
You oh oh oh you
You make me sad
And you know it´s upright
Is upright

[Chorus]
Don't ask me love
Cause you know how much I love you
And everyday I make it realized
If you don’t feel the love I always give you
I think I'm gonna change my mind

[Outro]
Don't ask me love
Don't ask me love
